Package distibuted.socket.middleware

Class SocketHandler<ReceiverType>

java.lang.Object
distibuted.socket.middleware.SocketHandler<ReceiverType>
Type Parameters:
ReceiverType - type of the interaction-receiver object
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClientSocketHandler, ServerSocketHandler
public abstract class SocketHandler<ReceiverType> extends Object
This class is used to manage socket connections

This class only send and receives SocketObjects, when it receives a SocketObject it tries to act as the sender of the interaction

    • waitForReceive

      protected void waitForReceive(ReceiverType receiver) throws RemoteException
      This method waits for a SocketObject sent on the input stream and call interaction on it, acting as the sender
      Parameters:
      receiver - the SocketObject receiver object
      Throws:
      RemoteException - when an input/output exception occurs

      This method sends a SocketObject on the output stream
      Parameters:

      Throws:
